title: I have a problem with rads_user_kernel.exe
body: i try to set the setting permissions system but it dosen t work ,please help me,ty

replies.body:
Since you're still having issues with kernel error and have already tried all the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run a set of system logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to your ticket, you'll expedite your service time.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
